Allow: /

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://bellbistro.co.uk/sitemap.xml

# Preferred crawl delay
Crawl-delay: 1

# Disallow specific paths if needed
# Disallow: /admin/
# Disallow: /private/

# Allow specific important pages
Allow: /index.html
Allow: /about.html
Allow: /menu.html
Allow: /contact.html
Allow: /images/
Allow: /css/
Allow: /js/
